channel.title: PNPC Not Working
channel.description: It's not just the PNPC that's not working, it's all of the NPC's people can turn into... Like, none of them are working. PNPC just sort of, turned off. Can anyone tell me why?

item.title: PNPC Not Working
item.dc:creator: @killah246 Killah246
item.description:
@killah246 wrote:

It usually doesnt work at all on fr33sc4p3 or something …

Read full topic

item.title: PNPC Not Working
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“Aftermath, post:4, topic:75950”]Make sure that nothing changes whether PNPC is on or off. If you did some tutorial where an item turns you into a NPC that might have messed it up.[/quote]Hmm… Well I did try to change the Item’s transforming things… One sec, I’m gonna take that out and try again.

Read full topic

item.title: PNPC Not Working
item.dc:creator: @Aftermath_961 Aftermath
item.description:
@Aftermath_961 wrote:

Make sure that nothing changes whether PNPC is on or off. If you did some tutorial where an item turns you into a NPC that might have messed it up.

Read full topic

item.title: PNPC Not Working
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“Aftermath, post:2, topic:75950”]Make sure that the PNPC command isn’t in a block which requires admin. I’d just cut it from where it is and move it to the start of customCommand.[/quote]It’s still not working…

Read full topic

item.title: PNPC Not Working
item.dc:creator: @Aftermath_961 Aftermath
item.description:
@Aftermath_961 wrote:

Make sure that the PNPC command isn’t in a block which requires admin. I’d just cut it from where it is and move it to the start of customCommand.

Read full topic
